column5: Couple of Questions:1. I assume that Canada has veterans organizations similar to the American Legion or the VFW; is that correct?2. Do they have local posts that sell adult beverages?3. Are US American Legion members welcome at these posts?4. Does Dryden, Ear Falls or Red Lake have such posts?Thanx for the info
Yes Ear Falls has a Legion and Americans are welcome especially vets or family of vets. Most Canadian towns have one

YES ALMOST ALL NW ONTARIO HAVE ROYAL CANADIAN LEGIONS ,AND YES YOU WOULD BE MORE THAN WELCOME .IM SURE ANY VET FROM CANADA DOES NOT AGREE WITH OUR GOVERNMENT AND WOULD WELCOME YOU QUITE WELL ..............PRAYERS OUT TO YOUR FORCES
Thank you. Semper Fi! USMC, Republic of Viet Nam, 69-71.
The Red Lake Legion is across the street from Howey Bay motel. Spent a whole week in there one night. DMZ, '69 Recon
I appreciate the response. Where abouts is the Ear Falls Legion (in relation to the Northland or the Trillium).USS Enterprise (carrier --- not the starship)(1966-1970)
